posts.description: Clearing The Rape Kit Backlog Is Fraught With Obstacles
posts.extended: RT @RAINN01: Countless untested rape kits sit in police storage throughout the U.S. @vocativ's @abigailtracy explores why:

posts.description: Nadim Kobeissi  on Twitter: "The NSA booth's been unmanned the entire time I've been at this conference, so I'm sitting there answering questions. http://t.co/an4S1xzdIe"
posts.extended: The NSA booth's been unmanned the entire time I've been at this conference, so I'm sitting there answering questions.
